read_namelist.f90

00001 
00004 
00005 module read_namelist
00006 
00007 implicit none
00008 integer, parameter :: LONG = selected_int_kind(9)
00009 integer(kind=LONG) :: nP = 1000 !< Number of particles to use.
00010 real :: particleSize = 10.0e-04 !< Gaussian particle size in \%c. 
00011 logical :: gParticle = .false. !< Use gaussian particle shape or not.
00012 character(len=100) :: pl_fileName = 'data/fdis_25keV_D_6_flat_D3D.dav' !<Input particle list filename.
00013 character(len=100) :: eqdsk_fileName = 'data/g122080.03100' !<Input gEqDsk filename.
00014 real :: vPerInRange = 2.0 !<vPer grid range in \%c
00015 real :: vParInRange = 2.0 !<vPar grid range in \%c
00016 integer :: sR = 6 !<Number of grid points to span with gaussian. Note: choosing a value to small may give discontiuities for large particleSize values.
00017 integer :: R_nBins = 10 !<Number of bins in R (Major radius).
00018 integer :: z_nBins = 20 !<Number of bins in z (Vertical).
00019 integer :: vPerp_nBins = 64 !<Number of vPer bins. Note: set this value low (~16) when gParticle = .false.
00020 integer :: vPar_nBins = 128 !<Number of vPar bins. Note: set this value low (~32) when gParticle = .false.
00021 real :: amu = 1.0 !< 1.0 for H, 2.0 for D, etc ...
00022 logical :: plotOrbit = .false. !<Use DISLIN to plot the orbits when noAveraging = .false. but this only works on dlg-hp now and is primarily for debugging. So leave it off.
00023 logical :: NFO = .false. !<Compute orbits without finite orbits.
00024 logical :: noAveraging = .false. !<No orbit averaging, just particles where they are.
00025 logical :: pList_is_nCDF = .true. !<If using a DLG netCDF input particle list set this. This is used in the sMC-rf code or when re-mapping the ORBIT-rf output on a high resolution sMap grid.
00026 real :: weightLimit = 1.1e18 !<If the particle weight is above this number the particle is ignored.
00027 real :: traceStepLength = 0.002 !< Approximate step length [m] of integrator in m.
00028 integer :: usePtsPerTrack = 50 !< Approximate number of points to use from each track in the orbit averaging.
00029  
00030 namelist / P2FIN / nP,&
00031     gParticle, &
00032     particleSize, &
00033     pl_fileName, &
00034     eqdsk_fileName, &
00035     vPerInRange, &
00036     vParInRange, &
00037     sR, &
00038     R_nBins, &
00039     z_nBins, &
00040     vPerp_nBins, &
00041     vPar_nBins, &
00042     amu, &
00043     plotOrbit, &
00044     NFO, &
00045     noAveraging, &
00046     pList_is_nCDF, & 
00047     weightLimit, &
00048     traceStepLength, &
00049     usePtsPerTrack
00050 
00051 contains
00052 subroutine init_namelist
00053 
00054     implicit none
00055     character(len=100) :: nml_fileName
00056 
00057     nml_fileName    = 'p2f.nml'
00058     
00059     open ( 7, file = nml_fileName, delim = 'APOSTROPHE' )
00060     read ( unit = 7, nml = P2FIN )
00061     close ( 7 )
00062 
00063 end subroutine init_namelist
00064 
00065 end module read_namelist
